title: HOUR 1 - Reflecting on John Madden's Life, Career and Legacy
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Reflecting on John Madden's Life, Career and Legacy
description:
Colin opens up the show with his thoughts and memories of the late John Madden. Nick Wright joins the show to reflect on the life, career and legacy of John Madden. Plus, Colin believes the Rams stole Matt Stafford by being able to give up late picks. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
